item.g:title: Sony A7 S III Full Frame Camera Body + 2 battery and charger (NO memory card)
item.g:description: Taking the S series to a whole new level of full-frame movie expression, spectacular new speed combines with supreme sensitivity and ultra-low noise to put previously impossible 4K movie shoots on the menu, with high dynamic range, breathtaking focusing, and extra-strong image stabilisation. Your new creative potential awaits.
